seg.source: 主办方希望通过文物展，让当地人民更多地了解历史悠久的中国文化，从而增进两国人民之间的相互理解和友谊。
seg.translation: The sponsors hoped that the exhibition of antiquities would allow the locals to better understand Chinese culture which has a long history, thereby increasing mutual understanding and friendship between the citizens of the two countries.
